basics.name: Jeroen Claessens
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Richard hails from Tulsa. He has earned degrees from the University of Oklahoma and Stanford. (Go Sooners and Cardinal!) Before starting Pied Piper, he worked for Hooli as a part time software developer. While his work focuses on applied information theory, mostly optimizing lossless compression schema of both the length-limited and adaptive variants, his non-work interests range widely, everything from quantum computing to chaos theory. He could tell you about it, but THAT would NOT be a “length-limited” conversation!

work.name: Norsepower
highlights: Build a simplified, visual appealing simulator to put on the landing page

work.name: Norsepower
highlights: Build custom C wrapper for a SimuLink model

work.name: Soundstorm
work.summary: Due to COVID-19 every festival during the summer of 2020 was cancelled. We wanted to digitize festivals by creating a 3D environment where people could come together to enjoy musical performances and markets in Corona times. I helped setting up the proof-of-concept for a local festival in Kaprijke. Due to my internship abroad, I stopped working on this project for now.

work.name: Adshot.io
work.recommendation: Jeroen joined our team as a student developer at the early dawn of Adshot. Whilst completing his bachelor of applied computer science he kept on working with us for more than 2 years. During these two years, Jeroen became an indispensable part of our team as he never ceased to amaze me with his broad skillset across different disciplines of application development as well as his motivation to continuously improve our application.
highlights: Build new features frontend to backend

work.name: Narato
work.summary: Research project using deeplearning techniques to monitor and predict a chemical crystallization process based on image- and metadata. This order is sent by KdG and is commissioned by Janssen Pharmaceutica.
highlights: Researched how to use computervision & AI to monitor a chemical crystallisation process
Build an AI model to recognize distinct crystals and another model to verify how well a crystal is forming
Build a UX friendly user interface to visualize the results and make it possible to play through the process as a video

work.name: Technicolor
work.description: Technicolor works with creative and technology leaders in content creation, distribution and consumption to seamlessly deliver experiences worldwide.
work.summary: Internship of 2 weeks with the task to make a macro in Excel (VBA) to automate data.
highlights: Succesfully wrote a VBA Macro to automate data processing

volunteer.summary: Global movement of free coding clubs for young people.

education.area: Applied Computer Science with focus on Application Development

publications.name: Video compression for 3d media
publications.summary: Innovative middle-out compression algorithm that changes the way we store data.

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.

projects.name: Miss Direction
projects.description: A mapping engine that misguides you
highlights: Built by all women team of newbie programmers
Using modern technologies such as GoogleMaps, Chrome Extension and Javascript
